lead_paragraph: Mike Rice, the disgraced former Rutgers coach who was fired for abusive treatment of his players, is gaining renewed respect on the sidelines of high school games.

headline.print_headline: A Coach Finds His Way Back
headline.main: The Rehabilitation of a Coaching Outcast

snippet: Mike Rice, the disgraced former Rutgers coach who was fired for abusive treatment of his players, is gaining renewed respect on the sidelines of high school games....
abstract: Former Rutgers basketball coach Mike Rice, who was fired in 2013 after being captured on video verbally and physically abusing players, has re-emerged as high school basketball coach at Patrick School in NJ with highly-touted Division I recruits under his tutelage; credits his rehabilitation to learning from his mistakes and help of friends.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
